meta.rarity: rare â€” Niche, specialized vocabulary; include a short gloss/definition.

items.concept: What happens when you share a password online?
items.hook_question: Do you think your username is safe?
items.mini_task: Think of 3 things that can make your password less safe.

items.concept: What does a 'man-in-the-middle' attack look like in real life?
items.kid_gloss: A bad guy sitting between you and the internet
items.hook_question: Imagine you're ordering food online. What would happen if someone sat between you and the kitchen?
items.mini_task: Draw a picture of this scenario.

items.concept: How can hackers use 'phishing' to get your login info?
items.kid_gloss: Tricking you into sending in secrets
items.hook_question: Have you ever gotten a message from someone asking for a secret code?
items.mini_task: Write a phishing email that might trick your friend.

items.concept: What is a 'viruses' and how can it spread through a computer?
items.kid_gloss: A bad program that eats up all the space
items.hook_question: Imagine your computer has eaten too much of its own food.
items.mini_task: Draw a picture of what might happen to your computer if it's full of viruses.

items.concept: What is 'keylogging' and why is it bad?
items.kid_gloss: A way for hackers to record every keystroke
items.hook_question: Do you think someone might be watching what you type?
items.mini_task: Think of a time when you needed to keep something secret.

items.kid_gloss: Bad program that helps mean people
items.hook_question: Imagine someone has a special tool to make their online problems worse.
items.mini_task: Write a story about a character who uses malware to bully others online.

items.concept: What is 'password cracking' and why should you use strong passwords?
items.hook_question: Do you think it's hard for someone to guess your password?
items.mini_task: Think of 3 things that can help make your password more difficult to guess.

items.concept: What is 'social engineering' and how can hackers use it to get what they want?
items.kid_gloss: Trying to trick people into doing something bad
items.hook_question: Imagine someone asks you for your lunch money.
items.mini_task: Write a story about a character who uses social engineering to scam someone.

items.hook_question: Do you think it's easy to hide who you are on the internet?
items.mini_task: Think of a time when you wanted to hide something from someone.

items.concept: What is 'pharming' and why should you avoid clicking on suspicious links?
items.kid_gloss: Trying to trick you into going somewhere bad
items.hook_question: Imagine you click on a link that takes you to a weird website.
items.mini_task: Write a story about a character who falls victim to pharming.
